A new comedy from Academy Award-nominated director Jason Reitman [Up in the Air<\/em><\/a>] and Academy Award-winning screenwriter Diablo Cody [Juno<\/em><\/a>]. Marlo [Academy Award winner Charlize Theron<\/a>], a mother of three including a newborn, is gifted a night nanny by her brother [Mark Duplass<\/a>]. Hesitant to the extravagance at first, Marlo comes to form a unique bond with the thoughtful, surprising, and sometimes challenging young nanny named Tully [Mackenzie Davis<\/a>].<\/p>","in_theaters":"
